text: The third season of the American animated anthology series What If...? is based on the Marvel Comics series of the same name. It is part of the Marvel Cinematic Universe (MCU), but each episode is set in a different universe. Jeffrey Wright stars as the voice of the Watcher, the narrator of the series. Many actors from the MCU movies return to voice their characters, while others are replaced by other voice actors. It is produced by Marvel Studios Animation. The season will be released on Disney+. == References == == Other websites == * What If...? (season 3) at IMDb Category:Marvel Cinematic Universe television series
title: What If...? (season 3)
